original_title: The Magic Door (A Rec Room Movie)
overview: A group of 3 friends take a trip down memory lane and go to play basketball in a spot they used to all hang out in, after a series of events, they get sucked into this mysterious, ominous door. they all get split up and must try find their way back together and back to the door they were sucked into.
title: The Magic Door (A Rec Room Movie)
